thread.title: SV
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by SV

author: SV
title: SV
text: From the first second when I saw a Stone which I wanted to purchase I was instantly taken care of Mary Whitney offering me answers to all my questions. I wanted a GIA Report as well, all went really smothly and quickly, honestly one of my best experiences online. Everything as expected and beyond. Lovely Documentation was attached with several different details of the Stone. Couldn't be happier. Definitely will buy from The Natural Sapphire Company again. All the best!
